column4: 11.10, screen brightness. The key combination for brightness is fine, Fn+F1 and Fn+F2 are recognised. The notification windo shows the brightness. But it has no effect.
echo 150 | sudo tee /sys/class/backlight/panasonic/brightness works fine too.
you'll probably need some drivers / software package from your laptop manufacturer
I had to install some samsung specific packages in order to be able to use those keys
Thanks, I will have a look into it.
That said, my drivers are the correct ones but the key bindings are a goof up.
